Description:
My client is a leading innovative and technology company and has been into the education forefront for more than two decades.They are looking for a Vice President of Product who will play a pivotal global role in shaping the future of digital education on a large scale. You will be leading the product division, driving innovation and ensuring the development of world-class solutions that have a far-reaching impact.Role: Vice President of Product ManagementLocation: Mumbai / KolkataExperience: 15+ yearsWhom are we looking for?15+ years of experience in product management, with a proven track record of developing and launching successful products in the technology or education sector.
Exceptional leadership and team management skills, with the ability to inspire and drive teams towards excellence.
A deep understanding of client needs and the ability to translate them into product solutions.
A keen sense of market trends and competition, with the ability to identify opportunities and threats.
Strong financial and budget management skills.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and clients.
Experience working in a global environment and managing diverse teams is a plus management capabilities.If this is a role that is in-line with your profile, then let's talk. Write to me at Athira.Gopin[email protected] and we shall connect to discuss the opportunity.Job Details
